longInfo:
Passport required. 
- Nationals of Italy traveling without a passport must have a
  document accepted for entry, valid on arrival.
- Nationals of Italy are allowed to enter with an expired
  passport.
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of a National ID Card issued to:
 - nationals of Italy; 
- Holders of a birth certificate for minors (Certificato di
  nascita per minori) issued by Italy, provided it contains a
  stamp issued by the Police Office (Questura). 

VISA NOT REQUIRED.

Minors:
- Minors (under 14 years of age), 
- WARNING! In accordance with European Union (EU) Legislation,
  all minors who are nationals of Italy will be expected to
  hold their own passport or National ID Card (where
  applicable) when departing from Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus,
  Romania or a Schengen Member State . 
- All minors who are nationals of Italy are expected to hold
  their own travel document
